With the release of Bootstrap 5.3, container breakpoints and media queries have been introduced to provide more flexibility in designing layouts for different screen sizes. This documentation will guide you through the usage of container breakpoints and media queries in Bootstrap 5.3. ## Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide a comprehensive understanding of container breakpoints and media queries in Bootstrap 5.3. It will cover the requirements, step-by-step instructions, code snippets, troubleshooting, best practices, and recommendations for using container breakpoints and media queries effectively. ## Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow this documentation, you will need the following: - Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Bootstrap 5.3 installed in your project - A code editor or IDE ## Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
